screen_desc: The screenshot shows the "Picture-in-picture" settings for Google Play services on a smartphone. The app version is displayed as 22.24.13. There is an option to allow picture-in-picture, which, when enabled, allows the app to continue displaying a video window on top of other apps when leaving the primary app. The switch is currently turned on.
action_think: The user wants to turn off picture-in-picture for the Google Play services app. The current screen shows the settings for Google Play services, and the toggle switch for 'Allow picture-in-picture' is visible. The next action is to turn off the toggle switch to disable picture-in-picture for the app.
action_plan: Turn off the toggle switch for 'Allow picture-in-picture' to disable picture-in-picture for the app, and then look for confirmation that picture-in-picture is disabled.
Verify that the switch is off to confirm the action and ensure that picture-in-picture is disabled for the app.
action_desc: click on the toggle switch for 'Allow picture-in-picture' located at the right and upper part of the screen.
action_result: I have turned off the picture-in-picture feature for Google Play services. This action should prevent the app from creating a picture-in-picture window when it's open. However, since the feature is off, there won't be any impact on the completion of your request.
